DOC.brief_summary: A complex training dynamic leg-press visual feed-back improve coordinative capacity , power , sensorimotor cognitive aspect classic train leg-press without visual feed-back .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Classic Leg-press Training Complex Leg-press Training Dynamic Leg-press
DOC.detailed_description: The project evaluate two different resistance training program leg press . One group perform standard resistance training aim muscle hypertrophia , group perform complex resistance train combine rate force development training , power training , speed endurance well sensorimotor aspect ( i.e . follow visual feedback reproduce give force joint angle ) . Hypotheses : Participants complex training group change relation counter movement jump squat jump , i.e . improve counter movement jump improve sensorimotor capacity .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult ( > 18yrs ) participant Able resistance training Recent injuries prevent resistance training
